short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Google and find results based on connected Raindrop saved websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Raindrop && Google Search: Your Personal Web, Unified and Secure

Elevate your search experience with Raindrop && Google Search - the browser extension that seamlessly integrates Google's powerful search capabilities with your curated Raindrop bookmarks, all while maintaining your privacy.

Key Features:
Unified Search: Simultaneously explore Google's vast resources and your personal Raindrop library.
Full Coverage: Search across all folders and subfolders in your Raindrop account.
Intelligent Ranking: Results are prioritized by relevance, surfacing your most valuable information first.
In-Depth Analysis: Go beyond titles - search through URLs, descriptions, personal notes, and highlights.
Smooth Integration: Your private Raindrop results appear naturally within Google's search page.
Privacy and Security:
Zero Data Collection: Raindrop && Google Search does not collect, store, or transmit any of your personal information.
Direct API Usage: We utilize Raindrop's official API, ensuring secure and authorized access to your bookmarks.
Local Processing: All searches within your Raindrop data are processed locally on your device.
No Third-Party Servers: Your data never passes through our servers or any third-party systems.
How It Works: When you perform a Google search, Raindrop && Google Search activates, scanning your saved websites in this sequence:
Title
URL
Description
Notes
Highlights

This process occurs instantly and securely, without compromising your privacy or data integrity.

Perfect for students, researchers, professionals, and information enthusiasts, Raindrop && Google Search enhances your search efficiency while keeping your data under your control. Never lose track of that crucial article or insightful comment again!

Transform your browsing experience. Make every search smarter, faster, more personalized, and completely private with Raindrop && Google Search.

Unify your digital world - where your personal knowledge meets the power of Google!
Buy this Chrome extension at
https://ziyoumaa.gumroad.com/l/iyocl
